From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lady Hawk stood confused as the shot hit at her feat forcing her to jump
back. She was tempted to retaliate in the same manner, but decided it better
to end the circle of violence. "I thank you and hope that when next we meet
it will be as friends." The half hawk took flight and proceeded toward the
exit hoping that she wouldn't be stopped by another alliance bot.
----- Original Message -----
From: SOULSTICE <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:49 AM
Subject: Re: Bad move Soulstice.


> Gotron leapt the sweep and landed on his feet, the gun still aimed towards
> Lady Hawk's head.
>
> Gotron: Now you see? It is so easy to die in this world. Anyone can be
your
> friend...or your enemy. Burning Hammer taught me that. Who do you think
> Zardus would believe? I can plant all of the evidence in my favor, it'll
> look like I killed you out of self defense. Now get out of here!.....You
are
> free to go.....I do not wish to harm another Alliance member, but I do as
I
> must. My temper is boiling, so just get away from me.
>
> Gotron aims downward and fires at Lady Hawk's feet.
>
> Gotron: Run!
>
> ----- Original Message -----
